export const secondCategoryData = [
  {
    "id": 1,

    "secondIn" : "Strong visualization.",
    "classified": false,
    "code": "NTC 2567"
  },

  {

  {

    "classified": ["No tiene clasificación","No classification"],

  },

  {

    "firstIn": "No tolerance.",
    "secondEs" : "Más de 5 mm de área en cualquier parte de la prenda.",
    "secondIn" : "More than 5 millimeters of the area in any  part of the garment.",
    "classified": false,
    "code": "NTC 2567"
  },

  {
    "id": 6,
    "titleEs":" MANCHA POR RASTRO DE ADHESIVO",

    "descriptionEs":"Contaminación presentada en la tela por residuos de material fusionado, o cinta adhesiva.",
    "descriptionIn": "Adhesive stain: Contamination presented in the fabric by residues of fused material, or adhesive tape.",

    "secondIn" : "Strong visualization",

    "code": "NTC 2567"
  },

  {

    "img": "https://img.techpowerup.org/201111/medidas-incorrectas-fuera-de-especificacion.png",
    "descriptionEs":"Cuando se mezclan tallas,porque no se tuvo cuidados al amarrar los paquetes.",
    "descriptionIn": "Sizing out of tolerance: When sizes are mixed, by carelessness when tying the packages.",

    "descriptionIn": "Non-conforming product by design: Nonconformities in the design process that generate alterations in the final product different from what is expected.",

  {

    "secondEs" : "Si afecta comodidad y modelación.",
